column4: ok any idieas on why I can only blank/burn cd/dvds with gnomebaker in root?
Is there a special group or something I need to add my account to?
ls -l the device and paste the output
what is the best way to see the list of groups i am in?
System -> Administration -> users and groups -> groups
what errors are you getting, does the same thing work as root?
should be find as it's full perms for everyone
have you tried runnig gnomebaker from within a terminal window to see if additional debugging info is pasted there which might help you?
that last error's an interesting one
is that 'unable to create temp' thing the last thing you get
double check your config and make sure you're not using any temp directories or anything else you dont have permission to write to
